name: SONAR (hitLAG)
description:
SONAR is a small black-and-white game where you control a robot with a single ability: A sonar wave!   Completely blind to your environment, you must guide your new friend to the control panel in each level to restore power to the dark, mysterious factory  that it awoke within. Be careful -- you never know what's around each corner...

Controls:

  • A : Jump
  • S : Sonar
  • <- / -> : Move
